import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Select, InputNumber, DatePicker, Divider, Form, Button } from 'antd' import { ExpenseTrackerContext } from "../../../context/context"; const { Option } = Select; const initialState = { type:'收入/支出', category:'種類', amount:'', date:new Date() } const FormOpt = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialState) console.log(formData) const {addTransaction} = useContext(ExpenseTrackerContext) const addItem = () =>{ addTransaction() } return (
setFormData({...formData,amount:e})} /> setFormData({...formData, date:dateString})} />
) } export default FormOpt
